title: Sefer HaBahir
text: 12. How do that Chaos is in Evil? For it is written (Isaiah 45:7), "He makes peace and creates evil." Thus Evil is from Chaos (Tohu), while Peace is from Desolation (Bohu). He created Chaos (Tohu) and placed it in Evil, as is written "He makes peace and creates evil." He created Desolation (Bohu) and placed it in Peace, as it says, "He makes peace in His high places."
